description: Browser extension for extracting URL parts with regex on hover

conventions.naming: camelCase for variables/functions, PascalCase for classes
conventions.file_structure: src/ for source code, separate directories for content/popup/background scripts

main_features: URL regex extraction on link hover
project_specific.performance_requirements: Must work efficiently on pages with many links
project_specific.security_considerations: Safe handling of user-defined regex patterns
